item.title: CVE-2024-4302|2024-04-29T05:46:52.134Z -- Super 8 -- livechat SDK
item.description: Super 8 Live Chat online customer service platform fails to properly filter user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to insert JavaScript code into the chat box. When the message recipient views the message, they become susceptible to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
